title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.3 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.3 - Legal base

State Regulations
(a) Section
19.07
(e) of the Mental Hygiene Law authorizes the

Commissioner of the Office of Alcoholism and Substance Abuse Services
(Commissioner) to adopt standards including necessary rules and regulations
pertaining to addiction services. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
